price: Wanakuapieni ili muwe radhi nao. Basi hata mkiwa radhi nao nyiye, Mwenyezi Mungu hawi radhi na watu wapotofu.
arabic: يَحۡلِفُونَ لَكُمۡ لِتَرۡضَوۡاْ عَنۡهُمۡۖ فَإِن تَرۡضَوۡاْ عَنۡهُمۡ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَرۡضَىٰ عَنِ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلۡفَٰسِقِينَ
footnotes: Wanakuapieni kwa tamaa ya kutaka muwe radhi nao. Hata mkakhadaika kwa viapo vyao na mkawaridhia, radhi zenu nyinyi peke yenu hazitowafaa, kwa sababu Mwenyezi Mungu amekasirika nao kwa upotovu wao na uasi wao kuipinga Dini!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: yaḥlifūna lakum litarḍaw ʿanhum fa-in tarḍaw ʿanhum fa-inna al-laha lā yarḍā ʿani al-qawmi al-fāsiqīna
